flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=5000000>>5000000 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 5000000 / 4 = <<5000000/4=1250000>>1250000 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 5000000 - 1250000 = <<5000000-1250000=3750000>>3750000 tokens more than any of her siblings.
#### 3750000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500000, not 5000000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
